author: CMSBParking
body:
**This PR concerns changes to the BDT model used for the identification of LowPtElectrons.**

**This PR is required by: cms-sw/cmssw#31220**

 ---

_File: LowPtElectrons/LowPtElectrons_ID_2020Sept15.root_
- This PR contains the BDT model described by a GBRForest object stored within a ROOT file.
- The file name in question is `LowPtElectrons/LowPtElectrons_ID_2020Sept15.root`.
- The new model is a "placeholder" that will be replaced in due course, based on a final retraining is performed with new MC samples.
- For the record, the relevant model hyperparameters are depth15 and trees=1000.
- The model expects regressed energy inputs (but this has a negligible impact on model performance).

_File: LowPtElectrons/RunII_Autumn18_LowPtElectrons_mva_id.xml.gz_
- The original `LowPtElectrons/RunII_Autumn18_LowPtElectrons_mva_id.xml.gz` has also been updated.
- The original version is broken and of no use. 
- The updated version in this PR is not used by default, but it is a viable model (tag 2019Aug07).
- We ask to add it to this PR "for the record" and as a baseline for future checks/studies. 

Validation has been performed with both "placeholder" models and their performances are consistent with our expectations.
title: LowPtElectrons: latest BDT model for ID (ROOT file format)
